name: changedetection
description: changedetection.io is a self-hosted web service that monitors website content for changes and sends notifications when updates occur. It supports diff highlighting, scheduled checks, RSS feeds, and multi-user dashboards.
features: Website Monitoring: Track changes on any website automatically. Never miss updates.
Change Notifications: Get alerts when content changes. Stay informed.
Diff Highlighting: Visual comparison of changes. See exactly what changed.
Scheduled Checks: Automatic monitoring at custom intervals. Hands-free operation.
RSS Feeds: Subscribe to changes via RSS. Flexible consumption.
Multi-User: Team dashboards for collaborative monitoring. Shared visibility.
Self-Hosted: Complete privacy for your monitoring data. Your watchlist, your control.
